courses.title: Digital Illustration
courses.description: Learn the latest techniques in digital painting and illustration, from concept to completion.

courses.title: Oil Painting Mastery
courses.description: Master the art of oil painting, exploring techniques from classical to contemporary styles.

courses.title: Sculpture Basics
courses.description: Discover the fundamentals of sculpture, including materials, techniques, and creative expression.

courses.title: Portrait Drawing
courses.description: Learn the techniques of portrait drawing, capturing the human face with precision and emotion.

courses.title: Watercolor Techniques
courses.description: Explore the world of watercolor painting, mastering techniques for creating vibrant, expressive works.

courses.title: Abstract Art Exploration
courses.description: Experiment with shapes, colors, and forms to express your creativity through abstract art.

courses.title: Mixed Media Art
courses.description: Combine various materials and techniques to create unique mixed media artworks.

courses.title: Art History: Modernism
courses.description: Explore the impact of modernism on the art world, from its origins to contemporary practices.

courses.title: Graphic Design Basics
courses.description: Learn the principles of graphic design, from typography to layout, and create compelling visuals.

courses.title: Printmaking Techniques
courses.description: Discover the art of printmaking, including techniques like etching, lithography, and screen printing.
